item.description:
Event Description:  This city isn't big enough for two warring factions, especially when those factions are composed of hundred-foot tall monsters!  Battle your enemies and smash up their home turf - just be sure you protect your own, too, otherwise there won't be anything left to smash when the dust clears.  Grab one of our safe foam swords and get ready for a 2-hour long battle for ages 6 and up.

Important Info:  Meetup events are generally $20/person.  However, if this is your first Meetup/Guard Up event and you live locally, you can call us at (781) 270-4800 for one free event (pre-approval necessary).  Event fee is payable upon arrival.  Please arrive at 6:45pm to register and sign your waiver.  All attendees under the age of 18 MUST have their parent or legal guardian in attendance to sign the waiver. Parents do not have to participate (but are highly encouraged - it is a ton of fun!).

You can also register, pay and sign the waiver online: www.guardup.net

If you are interested in trying a free semi-private lesson instead, please fill out our Introductory Lesson Request Form.

We look forward to seeing you!
item.how_to_find_us: Located across road from the Terrace Hall Ave Fire Dept
item.name: Sword Night: Giant Space Lizards!
